function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate management of green spaces may lead to the spread of contagious diseases among humans and animals.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health threats in urban areas.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and proper management of green spaces to minimize disease vectors and promote health.","Technologies":"Smart sensors for early disease detection, automated irrigation systems, and drone technology for monitoring.","People":"Residents and visitors of urban areas, as well as local wildlife and pets.","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, and environmental management agencies."}]}
